Subject: Closing Ceremonies
Description: As we officially shut down another amazing, exciting year for Penguicon, come hear about how it went, and what we've got our eye on for next year.  Speakers include:Scott Kennedy, Daniel Dugan, Nuri Gocay, Cylithria Dubois, Amanda Long-Adams, Amanda Robinson, Miranda Webster, Jessica Roland, Julie Winningham, Ann Lemay, Ann Leckie, Cathrynne Valente, Deb Nicholson, Jason Mars, Lingjia Tang - Track: Penguicon  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Opening Ceremonies
Description: Join our con chair, Scott Kennedy, the Con Committee, and our Guests of Honor as we open this bad boy up for the weekend.  You never know what surprises might be in store!  Speakers include:Scott Kennedy, Daniel Dugan, Nuri Gocay, Cylithria Dubois, Amanda Long-Adams, Amanda Robinson, Miranda Webster, Jessica Roland, Julie,Winningham, Ann Lemay, Ann Leckie, Cathrynne Valente, Deb Nicholson, Jason Mars, Lingjia Tang - Track: Penguicon  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: How will technology change society
Description: How we develop our technology may determine the world we will have in the future. Will it be a world of increasing personal freedom, or a totalitarian dystopia? And are we making that decision right now without knowing it?  Speakers include:Deb Nicholson, Jason Mars, Lingjia Tang - Track: Tech  - Duration: 1 hour - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: setup and run your own personal assistant
Description: Hack of Honor guests Jason Mars and Lingjia Tang will give a hands on seminar on setting up and running your own Intelligent Personal Assistants (IPA) like Apple's Siri, or Sirius, their open-source personal assistant.   Speakers include:Jason Mars, Lingjia Tang - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Sirius (Lucida) talk
Description: Hack of Honor guest Professor Jason Mars talks about emerging intelligent web services and Intelligent Personal Assistants, and specifically about Sirius, the open-source personal assistant being developed by him and Professor Lingjia Tang through Clarity Labs at the University of Michigan.  Speakers include:Jason Mars - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: The Reality and Fiction of Artificial Intelligence
Description: Artificial intelligences have been a staple of science fiction forever.  But where does the reality of AI end, and the fiction begin?    Speakers include:Ann Leckie, Jason Mars, Lingjia Tang, Jennifer Marsman - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
